website_summaries.verdict: This is a good mid-range choice for DIYers working on smaller drywall and painting projects, but professionals may be a little disappointed.
pros: Wingnut adjusters, with no tools required
3-position heel lock for different foot sizes
cons: Some parts may be missing/damaged on arrival

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for my son’s Halloween costume. He trick or treated with them all night. No complaints. Sturdy. Easy to put Together. And easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Kishel

customer_reviews.title: Liked
customer_reviews.text: It was a present...person said they liked them...but said something about feeling to light, that hopefully they won't bend but it'll do the job. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Nenna

customer_reviews.title: Love these stilts
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for ceiling cut-ins, or any job that requires you to be up high for long periods of time. Definitely look up how to adjust them on YouTube. These are my first pair of stilts, and it took about 2-3 tries to be comfortable enough to hold a bucket of paint and actually work without thinking about the stilts
customer_reviews.author: William Vail

customer_reviews.title: Quality product!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves his new stilts!! Very sturdy and just what he was looking for in stilts. We had to purchase padded straps being he is in them for 12 hours a day though. Fast shipping huge plus!!
customer_reviews.author: shirley

customer_reviews.title: Good for a cheap pair of stilts
customer_reviews.text: They slanted a little to the left, and i returned them because I no longer needed them. For a cheap pair of stilts though, they are really great.
customer_reviews.author: Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: There good id u want to do some wrok at home. Nothing major, they are thin and hard to get the correct position.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: These are very solid. They are pretty good . I'm happy with them
customer_reviews.author: Richard l.

customer_reviews.title: Not of good quality and poorly packaged I returned after a few hours use
customer_reviews.text: Not the quality I expected came with bolts off in the box and none in a package so had to buy bolts so we could use them . Poor quality packaging and the instructions are not clear at all but simple to assemble , Not sure if I will keep them not impressed should have stuck with Dura Stilts cost alot more but you get what you pay for . Junk returned them used only for a few hours I would not recommend this item .
customer_reviews.author: Bob the builder

customer_reviews.title: Used for drywall finishing
customer_reviews.text: Stilts needed adjusting because they made me feel like I was going to fall from them.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Rioux

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of stilts
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of stilts. They came in and I've used them for work. It beats moving a ladder around for sure. I'm sure they will gold up just fine!
customer_reviews.author: RawHyde

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: second round of these I have bought they work great
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product
customer_reviews.text: Worst product ever ....broke didnt even use them that long ....very upset with the quality of this product
customer_reviews.author: Alma santiago

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: horrible product, cheaply built, straps are garbage, do not but this product! i wish i could return!
customer_reviews.author: aaron walkenhorst

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Got exactly what I paid for. Easy to assemble, works like it’s supposed to, and makes my job easier
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Im happy with my stilts, it just needed a few adjustments and it worked like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Mahmoud

customer_reviews.title: Worked good for installing lights
customer_reviews.text: Worked good for installing lights, smoke detectors, etc in house w/10' ceilings. Seems to be quality product after several months of on and off use.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Did not feel stable or safe in these at all-could ...
customer_reviews.text: Did not feel stable or safe in these at all-could have something to do with our age! I think they’re well made though.
customer_reviews.author: Jacque

customer_reviews.title: Great Set of Stilts
customer_reviews.text: I have been a drywall finisher for the past 25 years. With that said I have used many different brands and sizes of stilts. These definitely fit the bill in comparison. I am extremely satisfied with the quality of these stilts. Adjusting the height is very easy. I would recommend these to anyone in need of convenient mobility when working on an area that is just out of reach.
customer_reviews.author: Scotsman83

product_meta.title: Yescom Drywall Stilts 24"-40" Aluminum Tool Stilt for Painting Painter Taping Blue
feature_bullets: Skid resistant with premium rubber soles
3-position heel bracket accommodating different foot sizes & preventing slippage in every direction
Adjustable from 24" to 40"to accommodate different working heights

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars155 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
